name: Escape from the Bullies
description:
Welcome to Escape from the Bullies ! 

You embody a young japanese teen, that received a weird paper at school, leading him to an abandoned building. The evening, as he is about to enter the building, he gets knocked out from behind !

Then, you wake up at the top of the building. Your goal ? Survive and find the first floor.

But be careful. You're not alone...

V. 0.3 :

Invisible blocks after a death : fixed

Elevators are now checkpoints, not trashes anymore

More lights

Background noises and music are now lower
